eeth thawath widihakin gaththoth, boru karala thamanwa athaharala dala giyapu pemwathiya nisa gela wala dagena siyadiwi hani karagaththa pemwathek “dan ithin awith samawa araganna parakkuyi“ kiyana widihatath dakinna puluwan man randi sitinne oyage rahana matha - polawen adi dahayak uda mata ahenawa oya kiyana deya - eeth handa nagannatawath ba mata oya kiwwa mata, mawa oonemayi kiyala passe oya giya mawa athaharala eth poddak inna oya kiwwa oyata dukayi kiyala aapasu harenna hithuwe naha kiyala..
